metadata.title: CVE-2024-40977 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: mt76: mt7921s: fix potential hung tasks during chip recoveryDuring chip recovery (e.g. chip reset), there is a possible situation thatkernel worker reset_work is holding the lock and waiting for kernel threadstat_worker to be parked, while stat_worker is waiting for the release ofthe same lock.It causes a deadlock resulting in the dumping of hung tasks messages andpossible rebooting of the device.This patch prevents the execution of stat_worker during the chip recovery.
